about.title: About me
about.content: Hi! I'm Gabriela (also known as ggpradas), a developer passionate about creating extraordinary web experiences. My journey in programming started with curiosity and has become a career dedicated to full stack development. I specialize in React, Node.js and modern technologies, always looking to learn and share knowledge through content creation. My goal is to build applications that not only work perfectly, but also provide exceptional user experiences.
